1.name: Sacred Agni
1.description: Premium access zone with front-stage visuals, Agni qr, and exclusive drinks.

2.name: Sacred Agni ++ (Only 6 left)
2.description: SURPRISE AWAITS FOR THIS TICKET USER IN THE EVENT.

3.name: Sacred Agni (Late Entry)
3.description: Late access to Sacred zone with all standard tier benefits and post-entry privileges.

4.name: Twilight Agni
4.description: General zone entry with great vibes and access to the main concert arena.

5.name: Twilight Agni (Early Bird)
5.description: Limited-time discounted general pass. Same zone, lesser cost.

6.name: Twilight Agni (After Hours)
6.description: Night-only Twilight access  perfect for the late-night rager.

7.name: Cosmic Agni
7.description: All-access Cosmic experience with lounge entry, backstage view, and necklace badge.

8.name: Cosmic Agni Deluxe
8.description: Includes all Cosmic benefits + AR ticket, merch kit, and limited-edition add-ons.

9.name: Cosmic Agni Gold+
9.description: Premium VIP treatment, collectibles, artist-signed digital pass and lounge priority.

10.name: Feral Agni
10.description: Mid-tier zone closer to the stage, NFC wristband and crowd surge access.

11.name: Feral Agni (Group Pack)
11.description: Bundle of 4 passes  rage with your full crew and get priority check-in.

12.name: Feral Agni (Rage Tier)
12.description: Includes Feral zone + rage kit: bandana, glow wristband & artist hologram card.
